attributes.action: Create a system that can distinguish between a genuine jobseeker who wants to work, and the "scrounger", for the jobseekers allowance scheme.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To enforce a system that distinguishes between a genuine job seeker who wants to work, and those who have no intention of working and claiming unemployment benefits. Only the genuine job seekers should receive the job seekers allowance.
